description: Residential cleaning involves routine and thorough cleaning of a home, including tasks like dusting, vacuuming, mopping, and sanitizing bathrooms and kitchens.
Commercial cleaning involves maintaining cleanliness and hygiene in business environments, including offices, retail spaces, and industrial facilities, through regular cleaning services.
Specialized cleaning targets specific needs, such as deep-cleaning carpets, windows, or upholstery, using tailored techniques and equipment for thorough results.
Event cleaning involves preparing venues before events and tidying them up afterward, ensuring a clean and organized environment throughout the event process.
Use of eco-friendly products and methods to minimize environmental impact and provide a healthier indoor environment.
Specialized cleaning focused on disinfecting surfaces to eliminate germs and viruses, often used in healthcare settings or during outbreaks.
Regular cleaning and maintenance services for businesses, including trash removal, restroom cleaning, and floor maintenance.
